title: Why is it that i have a feeling Ivern is LCS material?
body:
Insane clear speed (maybe faster than nidalee?)
Ridiculous utility
-a shield
-a slow
-a literal fucking bush
-a root/teleport
Solid level 3 ganks

Conclusion:seems like maokai on roids

And here's some tree memes
https://www.askideas.com/media/41/They-Still-Suspect-Nothing-Funny-Tree-Meme-Picture.jpg
https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/564x/56/f3/de/56f3de1b41e0c47b183965a3aefa91b3.jpg
https://www.askideas.com/media/41/Funny-Om-Nom-Nom-Nom-Tree-Meme-Image.jpeg
Well that's it for today. 
Stay snazzy summoners 
https://m.popkey.co/222c0f/KMWm0_s-200x150.gif?c=popkey-web&p=funny_or_die&i=funny-or-die-ent&l=search&f=.gif
_~~I think i've found the secret guys, more memes=more likes :D~~_

replies.body: I think every champ they release now will have LCS potential.
Why is it that every champ they release now has to have a root, stun, fear, dash, knock up, revive, heal, and everything but the bark of the matter (i really fucking tried pls)
I'm sure Riot will get to the **Root** Of the problem and nerf him somehow to avoid being used in LCS, **leaf**ing him to rot.
You are on point with the puns, aren't you?
If you're looking for puns, you're barking up the wrong tree. ;)

> [{quoted}](name=Tazret,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pl8bv4Nx,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-09-22T00:17:39.340+0000)
>
> You are on point with the puns, aren't you?

I like to **leaf** people with a smile on their faces. I have to learn to **branch** out to new and original ideas. http://orig04.deviantart.net/5fc7/f/2016/091/e/4/teemo_face_2_by_johnnyhedgehog1992-d9xbf4v.png
